scripts.build-lambda-dist: cd lambda-functions/user-service && npm run build && cp package-for-lambda.json dist/package.json && cd ../order-service && npm run build && cp package-for-lambda.json dist/package.json
scripts.deploy: npm run clean:cdk && npm run script:build-lambdas && cdk deploy
scripts.install-lambda-deps: cd lambda-functions/user-service && npm install && cd ../order-service && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.sam:build: npm run clean:cdk && npm run script:build-lambdas && npx cdk synth
scripts.sam:local: npm run sam:build && sam local start-api -t cdk.out/BetterLambdaStack.template.json --port 3000
scripts.sam:sync: npm run clean:cdk && npm run script:build-lambdas && npx cdk synth && sam sync --template cdk.out/BetterLambdaStack.template.json --watch
scripts.dev:local: npm run build-lambda-dist && sam build --template template.yaml && sam local start-api --template .aws-sam/build/template.yaml --port 3000
